Step.com | New York, NY | ONSITE | http://www.step.com

Step.com is building a platform where engineers and product managers can anonymously crowdsource their marketplace value. We get NYC startups and hiring experts to score your profile with personalized salary and seniority level estimates, while keeping you anonymous. Our vision is that you'll be able to know what your value is to every company, without having to interview or talk with a recruiter. We're currently in beta for NYC engineers and PMs.

We're looking to bring on a full-stack engineer to help us build out our platform. Ideal candidates have a computer science degree from a top school and/or have worked as an engineer at a startup at scale. We currently use Java, Javascript, Bootstrap, Zrender, MySQL and Elastic Search, but we're open to all languages and skills.

To get in touch, email jennifer@step.com.

Keywords: Ruby, Rails, Python, Node.js, React, Spring, PostgreSQL, Frontend, Backend, Fullstack, NYC, Engineer
